sentences.en: Can't you see what Freddy's doing?
sentences.cn: 难道你看不出来弗雷迪为何要这么做 吗 ?

sentences.en: Christ, he thought, I wish I were as solid as Freddy Archer thinks I am.
sentences.cn: 主啊, 他在心里默默说, 但愿我真象弗雷迪·阿切尔夸我的那样坚强.

sentences.en: Everyone knows you and Freddy both like her.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道你和弗雷迪都喜欢她.

sentences.en: Freddy bought a new suit just for the occasion.
sentences.cn: 弗雷迪专门为这个场合买了一套西装.

sentences.en: Freddy Rodriguez : I wasn't really too familiar with the story.
sentences.cn: 我对鲍比的故事一开始并不是很了解.

sentences.en: Freddy sees his coworker Xiu - ping watching an online video.
sentences.cn: 福瑞迪看到他的同事秀芳在看线上影音.

sentences.en: Freddy speaks very quietly and pads around in soft velvet slippers.
sentences.cn: 弗蕾迪说话轻声细气，穿着柔软的天鹅绒拖鞋蹑手蹑脚地四处走动。

sentences.en: Freddy the Pharisee: Rigid, narrow-minded, and legalistic, he has a rule for everything.
sentences.cn: 弗雷迪 法利赛人：顽固，狭隘，墨守陈规，他对一切事物都制定了规则。

sentences.en: Freddy: You're really full of it, Ivy. You're just blowing me off.
sentences.cn: 弗莱迪: 你真的是在随口说说, 艾薇, 你是想甩掉我嘛.

sentences.en: Freddy! I think you're an idiot.
sentences.cn: 弗雷迪! 我觉得你是个白痴.

sentences.en: Freddy's fresh bread is ready already.
sentences.cn: 福莱德的新鲜的面包已经准备好了.

sentences.en: Hello Freddy, it's only me, Maxine.
sentences.cn: 你好，弗蕾迪！是我，玛克辛。

sentences.en: I'll marry Freddy , I will , as soon as I'm able to support him.
sentences.cn: 我要嫁给弗莱第, 我决定嫁给他, 只要我能养活他.

sentences.en: John McClane : [ after covering a webcam ] Freddy, can you trace these guys?
sentences.cn: 约翰·迈克莱恩 (盖上了摄像机之后 ): 弗莱迪, 你能追踪到这些人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lola sees Freddy after school and he looks very sad.
sentences.cn: 放学后,劳拉看到弗雷迪.弗雷迪看起来很难过.

sentences.en: Sally and Freddy enjoy bird - watching. They are discussing their summer vacation.
sentences.cn: 莎莉和佛瑞迪喜欢赏鸟, 他们在讨论暑假.

sentences.en: This week's episode brought back Freddy Rumsen hoping that Pond's cold cream would be his ticket back into the ad business.
sentences.cn: 本周播放的这一集，弗雷迪•拉姆森重新出现在剧情里，他希望自己带来的旁氏冷霜的订单能帮他重回广告业。

trans.tran_cn: [男子名] 弗雷迪 Frederic,Frederick等的昵称，[女子名] 弗雷迪 Frederica的昵称
